body.p: People have often wondered what kind of performance improvement Gentoo Linux provides over other Linux distributions. This section is intended to help answer that question in a tangible way.

section.title: HispaLinux 2003: Gentoo Linux 1.4 vs. Mandrake 9.1 load-times

body.p: On 23 Sep 2003, Jose Alberto Suarez Lopez gave a presentation at HispaLinux 2003 where he demonstrated the load-time performance of the official Gentoo Linux 1.4 release. To compare load-time performance, he used Mandrake 9.1. Mandrake 9.1 ships with its binaries "pre-linked," which allows for faster load-times. In contrast, Gentoo Linux ships without pre-linked binaries by default.
These benchmarks compare Mandrake 9.1 against Gentoo Linux 1.4 in both a un-prelinked (default) and pre-linked state. Prelinking was performed as per the steps of the Gentoo Prelinking Guide.

Here is an overview of the operating systems benchmarked for the load-time test:
Mandrake 9.1 (with prelink enabled by default, default kernel)
Gentoo Linux 1.4 for Pentium III (official prebuilt "GRP" packages from CD, no prelink, gaming-sources-2.4.20-r3)
Gentoo Linux 1.4 for Pentium III (official prebuilt "GRP" packages from CD, with prelink, gaming-sources-2.4.20-r3)

Here is an overview of the system used for the load-time test:
Pentium III Coppermine 733Mhz
128MB RAM
1461 BogoMIPS (not an authoritative performance measure but people seem to like to know this :)

To perform the test, three applications (Mozilla, NetBeans and Kmail) were repeatedly loaded. Initial load speed as well as subsequent load speed was recorded. Note that NetBeans is not prelinkable, so the results for the Gentoo prelink and non-prelink test are identical for NetBeans.

body.note: In these tests, the first column lists initial load time. The second and third columns list the time required to load the application the second and third time respectively.

p.b: Test 1: Mandrake 9.1 with prelink enabled by default
Test 2: Gentoo Linux 1.4 for Pentium III without prelink
Test 3: Gentoo Linux 1.4 for Pentium III with prelink
p.note: The NetBeans test was not performed for Test 3 since NetBeans itself is not prelinkable.
